item.title: Nebula Operator Kind, oneliner installer for Nebula K8s Operator Playground
item.author: Wey Gu | 古思为
item.description: Nebula-Kind, an one-liner command to try K8s Operator based Nebula Graph Cluster on your machine, with the help of KIND (K8s in Docker)

item.title: Explore Chia Network in a Visualized Way
item.author: Wey Gu | 古思为
item.description:
本文分析了 Chia Network 的全链数据，并做了将全链数据导入图数据库：Nebula Graph 之中的尝试，从而可视化地探索了 Chia 图中数据之间的关联关系。

我把涉及的代码开源在了这里：https://github.com/wey-gu/nebula-chia

item.title: VSCode-nGQL, nGQL extension for VSCode
item.author: Wey Gu | 古思为
item.description: nGQL extension VSCode is built to integrate the Nebula Graph with VSCode for an awesome developer experience.

item.title: Nebula-Insights, How we leverage Serverless Cloud infra to setup Data Pipeline for Nebula Graph Community Insights
item.author: Wey Gu | 古思为
item.description: How we leverage Serverless Cloud infra to setup Data Pipeline for Nebula Graph Community Insights. We used Google Cloud Scheduler, Google Cloud Functions, BigQuery, and codes are shared in GitHub

item.title: Nebula-Up, oneliner installer for Nebula Graph Playground
item.author: Wey Gu | 古思为
item.description: A PoC utility for the newcomers or developers to bootstrap a nebula-graph playground in a oneliner command on Windows, Linux, and macOS(x86_64 and aarch64), w/o dealing with dependencies.

item.title: IPython-nGQL, Nebula Graph Jupyter Plugin
item.author: Wey Gu | 古思为
item.description: ipython-ngql is a python package to extend the ability to connect Nebula Graph from your Jupyter Notebook or iPython. It’s easier for data scientists to create, debug and share reusable and all-in-one Jupyter Notebooks with Nebula Graph interaction embedded.
